CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 27, 1953, pg. 7 reads: "Amvets Post 96 Gets Charter And Installs - When newly organized Amvets Post 96 received its charter at a banquet in Hotel Sheraton last Friday, the following officers were installed. Left to right first row: William Whitman, state commander; Sterling E. Gilliam, commander; Oliver Harper, adjutant; Stanley Valadez, national service officer, and Paul Kern, state adjutant.  Second row: The Rev. J.B. Cayce, James Whitlock, historian; Theodore Harper, service officer; Harry Harper, first vice commander; Jesse Johnson, provost marshal, and Thomas Harper, third vice commander. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left, first row: William Whitman, Sterling E. Gilliam, Oliver Harper, Stanley Valadez, and Paul Kern; second row: Rev. J.B. Cayce, James Whitlock, Theodore Harper, Harry Harper, Jesse Johnson, and Thomas Harper, gathered at table in Hotel Sheraton for Amvets Post 96 banquet
